project1.title: Top-down Video Game
project1.html:
Top-down Video Game

Start Date: 2023-05-01 - End Date: 2023-09-30 - Duration: 5 months

A top-down game with immersive mechanics.

Gameplay Preview

Development Process

This project was built using Unity and C# with a focus on AI behavior and level design.
project1.css: .game-container { background-color: #1e1e2e; color: white; padding: 20px; text-align: center; }

project2.title: 3D Platformer
project2.html:
3D Platformer

Start Date: 2022-01-15 - End Date: 2022-07-30 - Duration: 6 months

A fun 3D platformer inspired by classic games.

Level Design Showcase

Development Insights

The project focuses on smooth character movement, physics-based puzzles, and dynamic environments.
